document_data.caption: A map of Westgate showing the King's March lined in red.
document_data.name: King's March
document_data.mainbody: The '''King's March''' was a branched roadway leading into the city of [[Westgate]].
document_data.Location: The King's March began where the [[Trader's Road]] ended at [[Mulsantir’s Gate]] in the northwest section of the city. It branched several times before meeting [[Silverpiece Way]].
